fields.name: link_id
fields.description: Primary key â€“ could be SharedStreets Reference ID

fields.name: parent_link_id
fields.description: Optional. The parent of this link. For example,for a sidewalk, this is the adjacent road.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Optional. Street or Path Name

fields.name: directed
fields.description: Required. Whether the link is directed (travel only occurs from the from_node to the to_node) or undirected.

fields.name: geometry_id
fields.description: Optional. Foreign key (Link_Geometry table).

fields.name: geometry
fields.description: Optional. Link geometry, specific format could be WKT, GeoJSON, etc.

fields.name: dir_flag
length
fields.description: Optional. Length of the link in miles

fields.name: grade
fields.description: % grade, negative is downhill

fields.name: facility_type
fields.description: Facility type (e.g., freeway, arterial, etc.)

fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Optional. Capacity (veh / hr / lane)

fields.name: free_speed
fields.description: Optional. Free flow speed mph

fields.name: lanes
fields.description:
Optional. Number of permanent lanes (not including turn p
pockets) in the direction of travel open to motor vehicles.
It does not include bike lanes, shoulders or parking lanes.

fields.name: bike_facility
fields.description: Optional. Type of bicycle accommodation: unknown, none, wcl, sharrow, bikelane, cycletrack, offstreet path

fields.name: ped_facility
fields.description: Optional. Type of pedestrian accommodation: unknown, none, shoulder, sidewalk, offstreet path

fields.name: parking
fields.description: Optional. Type of parking: unknown, none, parallel, angle, other

fields.name: allowed_uses
fields.description: Optional. Set of allowed uses: shoulder, parking, walk, all, bike, auto, hov2, hov3, truck, bus, etc. e.g. [auto,bike]

fields.name: toll
fields.description: Optional.  Toll on the link, in cents.

fields.name: jurisdiction
fields.description: Optional.  Owner/operator of the link.

fields.name: row_width
fields.description: Optional. Width (feet) of the entire right-of-way (both directions).
